id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Set the ID of this entry for use in lambdas.

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/key_collector.html#component)*

source_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the key input device.

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/key_collector.html#component)*

min_length.docs:
**integer**: The minimal length of the desired key sequence. Below this, `on_result` automation will not trigger even if any of the `end_keys` was pressed.

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/key_collector.html#component)*

max_length.docs:
**integer**: The maximum length of the desired key sequence, after which the sequence will trigger the `on_result` automation witout having to press any of the `end_keys`

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/key_collector.html#component)*

end_keys.docs:
**string**: Keys used to *enter* the sequence.

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/key_collector.html#component)*

end_key_required.docs:
**boolean**: Only trigger `on_result` automation when one of the `end_keys` was pressed. Defaults to `false`.

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/key_collector.html#component)*

back_keys.docs:
**string**: Keys used to delete the last pressed key. Like *Backspace* on a keyboard.

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/key_collector.html#component)*

clear_keys.docs:
**string**: Keys used to entirely clear the sequence, all the pressed keys.

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/key_collector.html#component)*

allowed_keys.docs:
**string**: Keys allowed to be used. If not specified, then any otherwise unused keys will be allowed.

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/key_collector.html#component)*

timeout.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: Timeout after which to cancel building the sequence and delete all the keys.

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/key_collector.html#component)*
